<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get a quick list of security signals</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/api/v2/security_monitoring/signals"}></MethodEndpoint>


The list endpoint returns security signals that match a search query.Both this endpoint and the POST endpoint can be used interchangeably when listingsecurity signals.
## Request
<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Query Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"The search query for security signals.","example":"security:attack status:high","in":"query","name":"filter[query]","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"The minimum timestamp for requested security signals.","example":"2019-01-02T09:42:36.320Z","in":"query","name":"filter[from]","required":false,"schema":{"format":"date-time","type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"The maximum timestamp for requested security signals.","example":"2019-01-03T09:42:36.320Z","in":"query","name":"filter[to]","required":false,"schema":{"format":"date-time","type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"The order of the security signals in results.","in":"query","name":"sort","required":false,"schema":{"description":"The sort parameters used for querying security signals.","enum":["timestamp","-timestamp"],"type":"string","x-enum-varnames":["TIMESTAMP_ASCENDING","TIMESTAMP_DESCENDING"],"title":"SecurityMonitoringSignalsSort"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"A list of results using the cursor provided in the previous query.","example":"eyJzdGFydEF0IjoiQVFBQUFYS2tMS3pPbm40NGV3QUFBQUJCV0V0clRFdDZVbG8zY3pCRmNsbHJiVmxDWlEifQ==","in":"query","name":"page[cursor]","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"The maximum number of security signals in the response.","example":25,"in":"query","name":"page[limit]","required":false,"schema":{"default":10,"format":"int32","maximum":1000,"type":"integer"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details>

signal.","example":"Detect Account Take Over (ATO) through brute force attempts","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"tags"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"An array of tags associated with the security signal.","example":["security:attack","technique:T1110-brute-force"],"format":"array","items":{"description":"The tag associated with the security signal.","format":"string"}}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"timestamp"} required={false} schemaName={"date-time"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The timestamp of the security signal.","example":"2019-01-02T09:42:36.320Z","format":"date-time","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"id"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The unique ID of the security signal.","example":"AAAAAWgN8Xwgr1vKDQAAAABBV2dOOFh3ZzZobm1mWXJFYTR0OA","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"type"} required={false} schemaName={"SecurityMonitoringSignalType"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`signal`]"} schema={{"default":"signal","description":"The type of event.","enum":["signal"],"example":"signal","type":"string","x-enum-varnames":["SIGNAL"],"title":"SecurityMonitoringSignalType"}}></SchemaItem><li className={"closing-array-bracket-container"}><div className={"closing-array-bracket"}>]</div></li></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}}
